text:
Hotel is extremely new (they just opened in october 2019)

The room size is definitely generous (around 30m2 i believe) for the price they’re charging.
Room interior is clean and modern with minimal Balinese style.

Nothing to complain about location. Walking distance to major places tourist will go to seminyak.

I had a fried rice for my breakfast and i was surprised at how good it was ( at least for hotrl breakfast menu standard)

Most of the facilities are still under construction but they have pool and spa ready. 

Will definitely stay here on my next trip!

text:
I was looking for a hotel to extend my time in Bali and came across the Capital. The room are big, beautiful, brand news and spotless clean. Beautiful wood and stone finishes, very quiet and pleasant balcony and light.

The location is ideal: one side of the road leads to the main clubs, massages, markets and shopping of Petitenget. The other side leads to the main roads to Ubud and other places around Bali.

The staff was very responsive and always listening. I will come back to Bali and use this hotel again.

text: I am truly in awe with my 6 day stay at the Capital. I was informed that I was the 2nd guest 2 check-in after their grand opening and was treated like a queen. After escaping a nightmare hotel I (literally) ran across this gem. No reservation, no idea what to expect and I felt as if I was being welcomed home. They gave me a full tour hotel of the sleeping quarters and an extended tour of the property and facilities to ease my nerves from any possible false advertising (which is what I encountered at the previous "hotel nightmare"). Check in was easy and although the rooms and beds were brand new they allowed us a meal in Gin Sushi (great food,staff and devoted owners BTW) while they made sure the room was contruction-dust free and in tip top shape. They went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable, hydrated, fed, and relaxed by gifting us a free 1 hour massage which was the best massage I have gotten in Bali. I even got a bonus stretch at the end and she cracked every bone in my body. I boarded my flight back to NYC feeling lighter than a feather. Thank you to all the staff At Capital and the management team for making my stay exceptional. This Is definitely my go to hotel in Bali for both business or leisure. Cant wait to be back in a couple of months.
title: Feeling Apart of the CapitaL Family

I really enjoyed staying here! I stayed for just under a month, the room was very spacious and the staff were always polite and kind. The beds were comfy, the sheets were soft, and I loved how big the bathrooms are! I also loved that they had a balcony on my room and the Wi-Fi was very fast too
The only downside was they were renovating the restaurants in the hotel were closed. The pool upstairs was really nice and I liked the space around it so I could relax there all day. Location wise, was perfect for me, there is so much in that area and every thing else is 5-10 minutes away by a scooter.
Definitely going to be staying here again

text:
I reviewed my experience on Agoda (from where I made the booking) and decided to also share it here to warn potential visitors.

When we arrived for check in, the counter looked understaffed and we were told the room was still not ready by stated check-in time which was 2/ 3 pm  (the pillow covers were not cleaned and delivered, and towels were missing). Asked for a hand towel (because there was literally only one bath towel and one floor towel to share between my partner and I in the whole room) and they said they do not offer unless we specifically requested for one. Wifi was horrifically bad while the signal was also terrible (we used a company that was most well-covered in Bali already). I booked the business centre for working to receive better wifi, but ended up having a near-electric shock with a blown fuse accident while trying to plug in my computer charger into their electricity socket. The staff later explained it might've happened with the electricity shortage around the area, but never apologised nor followed up. 

If you decide to do laundry there, they would count by item while you have to fill in a very complicated and incomprehensive form, which would end up costing a lot more than your regular laundry stop. I would recommend finding a laundry store nearby (and ask them to do your wash in colder water/ separating darks from whites).

The website showed a sushi restaurant that "has been in renovation" since 2020, and it's now the end of 2022 but there are no site of construction or intention to build it. Truly curious if the restaurant was built for show to earn the 4-star title. There was no in-house room service kitchen either, they had to order from a restaurant/ bar nearby. 

That said, location is very convenient with walking distance to supermarket, bars, restaurants, the pharmacy. Room is also quite spacious for the price. Honestly, I would be more convinced and barred from disappointment if they had marked themselves as a 3-star hotel.
title: falsely advertised and I almost got electrocuted, hotel likely paid for the "Agoda preferred" title

text:
The hotel is located in a very busy street where popular bars and restaurants are located. Therefore, and because of the currently reduced room rates, there are a young audience and many Indonesian guests in the hotel.
 The young people don't necessarily care about the night's rest, the Indonesian guests often mix up the hotel room with their private home and don’t care about loudness. 
We spent 4 weeks in THE CAPITAL.  Overall for me it is more 3* than 4* level. 

 + central location, 20 min walk to the beach
 + friendly staff
 + modern, well equipped rooms
 + good WiFi
 + cheap price
 + underground parking available

 - a lot of young, inexperienced staff (interns?)
 - Staff does not care enough about the night's rest. Every third night we had to complain to the Lobby or to the neighbors directly. Make sure you don’t have a room where the rooms next door are equipped with 3 beds - it gets always very loud. 
 - all Room doors slamming loudly
 - House keeping service for our room 217 was very low standard (a lot of dust under the bed, the glasses in the bathroom were extrem dirty, the soap dispenser were not clean, there was dirt around the faucet.) Looks like there was a very quick cleaning after Covid lockdown and there is no supervisor housekeeping 
 - Small towels only on request
 - In the rooms you can hear everything through the wall
title: Disappointed

text: Based on my initial stay at this hotel, I decided to extend my stay, and I can only repeat, if not emphasize all the more how wonderful and uniquely amazing the staff and service are in particular. My review of this hotel expresses highest praise: Exceptionally great, professional and friendly service from beginning to end, exceptionally great housekeeping, room maintenance, and room service, well equipped room and hotel, nothing at all to point out as negative. (The staff has even been willing to help me receive the delivery of a parcel that had been directed to Ubud, by kindly arranging for one of the staff members to pick up the parcel en route via Ubud -- amazing!!). I extended my stay based on my previous experiences at this hotel, and I can only highly recommend it to any other travelers. I am extending now for the third and fourth times, and I think that this hotel, only having opened in 2019, deserves highest credit as one seeking to establish itself successfully among the competition in this business, not least now during difficult times of the pandemic. I wish the hotel a grand "comeback" once tourism reopens fully again in the hopefully not too distant future.
title: Exceptional from A to Z, exceptional service, exceptional cleanliness and standards

text:
Me and my friend took a holiday to Bali for three weeks in March. Our hope to travel round the beautiful island of Bali. 

We booked into the Captial hotel on our second 
night. This was a very last minute booking but they were able to accommodate us and how happy we were that we chose this wonderful hotel. Our stay there felt like a home away from home and nothing was too much trouble. We had the most lovely stay - so much so... we decided to return and finish our trip there too. 

The rooms were extremely clean and modern as were all the public spaces. I would recommend taking advantage of the spa treatments - they’re very reasonable priced and of an excellent quality.  

The location is perfectly ideal, a short walk to a good range of restaurants, cash points / money changers and small supermarket shops and only a short taxi ride to some of the renowned beach clubs like Finn’s or about 10 minutes into the town of Canggu - a must visit on any trip. 

The hotel is suitable for anyone! There are a variety of conference rooms all of which are fully equipped for those needing to do business while away. These a lovely roof top pool which provides some great views (and right next to a bar too - which offers happy hour). 

The staff here are super friendly at every point of contact, and they welcomed us back on our return with open arms.

From the stay at the hotel itself, to food and drink prices and spa treatments, everything is excellent value for money. 

We will defiantly be back. Thank you so much to all the staff - we really appreciate all your kindness throughout our stay. 

To any potential guests... get booking!! This hotel will make your trip and is most certainly worth the visit!!!!
title: the best hotel & most welcoming staff

text:
In these difficult times for everyone around the world, we found with my wife the perfect  place to stay in Bali  at Capital Hotel in Seminyak. 
We arrived in Bali on 7 March and haven't been able to go back to our home country Tahiti in French Polynesia. 
We start our 5th week here at Capital Hotel and we enjoy  :
- the quality of our room
- the staff dedication to excellent service
- access inside the hotel to Antoine & Gin Sushi restaurants
- access to gym and 2 swimming pools
- guarded parking for our scooter

Most pleasant and remarkable fact is that hotel management agreed very good room rate including delicious and full breakfast

We do not know when we be able to leave Bali back home but we do know that we feel safe here so let's relax and wait better days. 

Merci beaucoup 
-
title: Stay well and safe @ CAPITAL HOTEL Seminyak

text:
I have stayed in many hotels in Bali this was up their with the best of them,  the rooms are huge, very modern design and very clean,  love the rain forest shower.  

The huge bed is ultra comfortable, good working space in room.  Service is faultless the staff really go out of their way to make you comfortable and always welcoming, 

Gym is good,  roof top pool with amazing sunset views and also have a lap pool on the ground floor and the SPA is one of the best I have been to.

In room dining is very good and Gin Sushi the restaurant within the hotel is on point!!

I could not fault this hotel one bit in fact I extended by stay by 1 week and will be sad to leave.

Lastly the perfect location to all the hot spots, SPA's, beach, shopping and restaurant.

When ever I am in Seminyak, Bali i will always stay at The Capital Hotel & Resort, you have a repeat client in me.
title: Best hotel in Seminyak by Far

text:
I stayed in The Capital Hotel for consecutive long weekends as a base for business.The hotel is going through a "soft opening" being 90% complete. The fifth floor is yet to be opened. The location of the hotel is great for people wanting to be in the Seminyak/Petitenget area with the surrounding bars, restaurants and beach clubs.It is subject to the usual traffic snarls but if you are happy to jump on the back of a motor bike everywhere from KuDeTa to Cafe Del Mar are within five minutes. The beach is a twenty minute walk going down Jalan Cendrawasih.
The rooms are not huge but have a comfortable king size bed, TV with HBO and Fox movie channels, sports and news, a good size bathroom and an empty bar fridge which is great considering there is a Pepito market next door selling everything that you would find in a usual hotel mini bar at a quarter of the price. My room was on the third floor with rooftop views towards the west. From the fourth floor you can glimpse the ocean so the fifth floor views will be great. I had the same room on both stays, so I cannot comment on the views from other sides of the hotel.
The hotel has a small gym next to the swimming pool which is extremely well equipped for its size. They are very receptive to feedback and are making minor changes that that will make it even better. 
Antoine's Restaurant serves great quality food and their choice of breakfasts are both great value for money and tasty. I had sashimi at Gin Sushi which was also excellent. The staff are extremely friendly and polite and nothing is too much for them. That actually describes all the staff at the hotel, from the security through the front desk to housekeeping
The Capital is not a hotel that is really suitable for families, just like Petitenget, unless you are using it as a base for exploring Bali and winding down at the end of the day.. If that is the case then it is hard to go past the value that it offers at the moment.
I will certainly be staying there again.
title: Great value mew hotel

text:
We stayed at The Capital for 4 nights over New Years as it was one of the only hotels left in the area that wasn’t crazy expensive. We were quite surprised at the hotel and how nice and new it was. The room was huge with a nice big bed, shower worked perfect and was nice and hot which is always a win in Bali. The fridge was so cold which was another win!
A few points to be noted; there are not many beds by the pool, the walls seem to be very thin in the place so you can hear neighbours moving chairs, flushing toilets, outside noise etc. Pillows were not the comfiest. Room service menu wasn’t provided in the room and once I asked for it the staff did bring it up however there’s not much on there at all. There is a sushi restaurant connected to the front which was nice however not much on the menu. 
Overall the staff were lovely and friendly and made you feel very welcome, it’s a good location in Seminyak and well priced for what it is.

text:
Een fijn nieuw hotel in het centrum van Seminyak. Heerlijke luxe afwisseling na de verschillende guesthouses op Bali. Comfortabele kamer met fijne bedden, ook mogelijkheid voor 2 geschakelde kamers met tussendeur. Van alle luxe voorzien in een uitstekende prijs/kwaliteit verhouding. Groot zwembad met uitgebreide fitnessruimte. Eigen massagefaciliteiten met topkwaliteit masseurs. Goed en uitgebreid ontbijt met keuzemogelijkheden. Bovenal het erg vriendelijke en servicegerichte personeel. Wij zijn er in 1 vakantie 2x geweest omdat het zo goed beviel en centraal gelegen is.

A nice new hotel in the center of Seminyak. Wonderful luxury variety after the different guesthouses in Bali. Comfortable room with comfortable beds, also possibility for 2 connecting rooms with connecting door. Provided with every luxury in an excellent price / quality ratio. Large swimming pool with extensive fitness room. Own massage facilities with top quality masseurs. Good and extensive breakfast with choices. Above all, the very friendly and service-oriented staff. We have been there twice in 1 vacation because it was so well received and centrally located.
title: Excellente service!

text: Прилетели на Бали 31.01.2020 вечером, заказали трансфер. Сразу отметил для себя хорошую машину с белым кожаным салоном, а также вежливого водителя, который по дороге рассказывал про остров. Мы прилетели на 2 месяца и первой задачей было найти байк в аренду. И мне удалось его найти по реальной стоимости с помощью персонала, который дал контакты. Отель совсем новый, проживающих мало. Номера комфортные, вместительные и удобные. Персонал пока не опытный, но тем не менее, свои функции полностью выполняет. Все ребята вежливые, улыбчивые и готовы вам помочь. У нас был самый простой номер с большой ванной, что произвело большие впечатления, поскольку за такую цену на Бали это редкость. Тихое место, хороший вид из отеля (мы жили на 3 этаже слева по коридору), не громкий и хорошо работающий кондиционер. В целом, повторюсь, за свои деньги - просто супер вариант. Вокруг есть места под любой ценовой сегмент. В 10 минутах находится Potato Beach Club, очень удобно добираться до океана. В общем, нам очень понравился отдых в этом отеле. Это реальный отзыв. Переехав от туда на новое место, мы убедились в том, что это прекрасный отель за свою стоимость. Рекомендую оставаться здесь!
title: Прекрасно провели 10 дней отдыха в этом замечательном, новом отеле
